member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.KnobType
member.summary: Type of the knob.

member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.LineCapType
member.summary: Type of the gauge line endings.

member.name: T:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.Knob
member.summary: Nice, downward compatible, touchable, jQuery dial from https://github.com/aterrien/jQuery-Knob.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.Knob.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new control.

member.name: E:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.Knob.ValueChanged
member.summary: Fired when the user changes the value of the knob.

member.name: M:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.Knob.OnValueChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Fires the ValueChanged event.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.Knob.DisplayPrevious
member.summary: Returns or sets the DisplayPrevious property. When it's set to true, the widget briefly shows the previous value when the user is dragging the knob.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.Knob.ShowInput
member.summary: Shows or hides the input field.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.Knob.Value
member.summary: Returns or sets the value.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.Knob.MinValue
member.summary: Returns or sets the minimum value.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.Knob.MaxValue
member.summary: Returns or sets the maximum value.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.Knob.LineCapStyle
member.summary: Returns or sets the skin used to render the jQueryKnob.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.Knob.KnobType
member.summary: Returns or sets the type of knob.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.Knob.CursorSize
member.summary: Returns or sets the size of the cursor. Valid only when Type = KnobType.Cursor.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.Knob.ReadOnly
member.summary: Returns or sets the read only property. When set to true, the value of the knob cannot be changed by the user.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.Knob.Step
member.summary: Returns or sets the step size.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.Knob.Thickness
member.summary: Returns or sets the thickness of the gage.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.Knob.AngleArc
member.summary: Returns or sets the arc size in degrees.

member.name: P:Wisej.Web.Ext.jQueryKnob.Knob.AngleOffset
member.summary: Returns or sets the starting angle in degrees.

member.summary: Overridden to create our initialization script.

member.summary: Returns or sets the color of

member.summary: Overridden to return our list of script resources.

summary.para: jQueryKnob component. Implements the open-source jQueryKnowb control in Wisej.
